text: Uber co-founder and CEO Travis Kalanick has resigned...
...after investors pressured him to step down following six months of scandal and setbacks.
A group of investors sent a letter to Mr. Kalanick Tuesday,...
...expressing their doubt about his ability to implement changes...
...as the company works to battle allegations...
...that it has a workplace permissive of sexual harassment and sexism.
Earlier this  year, Uber said it is investigating claims by a former employee...
...that the company failed to discipline a manager who mistreated female employees...
